= Composition API

NOTE: `this.` is not available in the `setup()` function. 

[source,javascript]
----
<script>
    const app = new Vue({ 
        name: 'myName', 
        setup() { 
          let myVar = 0;

          const myFct = () => {

          }

          return {
            myVar, 
            myFct, 
          }
        }
    })
</script>
----

[source,javascript]
----
<script setup>

</script>
----
